file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-40-03-07 - LAVATORY DOOR - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL LAVATORY DOOR - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to clean the lavatory door parts. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 25-40-03-100-801-A LAVATORY DOOR PARTS - CLEANING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-40-03 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-40-03-100-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. LAVATORY DOOR PARTS - CLEANING A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to clean the components of the lavatory door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-00-00-100-801-A/700 EQUIPMENT/FURNISHINGS - CLEANING C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Rubber gloves Hand protection 1 available Commercially Safety goggles Eye protection 1 available Commercially Brush, Soft non-metallic bristles To remove the dirt AR available Commercially Wiper-Soft, Lint-Free For cleaning AR available F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) AMS 1550 or equivalent General Purpose Detergent/Degreaser AR MIL-PRF-680 or equivalent Solvent AR MIL-D-16791 Type I Neutral Detergent AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory door EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 25-40-03 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Lavatory door SUBTASK 110-002-A WARNING:PUT ON GLOVES AND GOGGLES WHEN YOU USE CLEANING MATERIALS AND DO NOT LET IT TOUCH YOUR SKIN OR EYES. CAUTION:THE DECORATIVE LAMINATE SURFACE OF VARIOUS INTERIOR COMPONENTS CAN BE DAMAGED BY THE USE OF INCORRECT CLEANING MATERIALS AND EQUIPMENT, OR IF YOU DO NOT MIX THE CLEANING MATERIALS AS SPECIFIED. (1) Clean all surfaces of the lavatory door, to remove dirt, oil and debris with neutral detergent or general purpose detergent/degreaser. Refer to cleaning procedures for plastic or vinyl panels ( AMM TASK 25-00-00-100-801-A/700). WARNING: THE SOLVENT CONTAINS POISONOUS AGENTS AND ARE FLAMMABLE. PUT ON GLOVES AND GOGGLES WHEN YOU USE IT AND DO NOT LET IT TOUCH YOUR SKIN OR EYES. HAVE A SUFFICIENT FLOW OF AIR OR USE RESPIRATORS. CAUTION: DO NOT LET SOLVENTS CONTACT THE DECORATIVE MATERIALS OR PLASTIC COMPONENTS. THEY CAN DAMAGE SOME COMPONENTS AND MATERIALS . (2) Clean all metallic parts of the lavatory door to remove dirt, oil and debris with solvent or general purpose detergent/degreaser. Refer to cleaning procedures for metal surfaces ( AMM TASK 25-00-00-100-801-A/700). NOTE: Do not permit solvent to evaporate on surface. Dry the parts with a clean, dry cotton cloth.
